author: taoalpha
title: Implement LRU Cache in JavaScript
summary: Introduction    LRU which is short for least recently used is a popular algorithm in cache. The basic idea is always put your items in order of used time, and when you insert new item into the fullfilled chache,remove the least recently used item in your memory. title: Array Operation Cost in JavaScript
